client-form.client-id-help: Unique identifier. If you leave this blank it will be automatically generated.
client-form.access-token-duration-error: The duration of access token is out of range.
client-form.refresh-token-duration-error: The duration of refresh token is out of range.
client-form.id-token-duration-error: The duration of id token is out of range.
client-form.access-token-timeout-help: Enter this time in seconds, minutes, or hours (Max value is 1000000 seconds (11.5 days)).
client-form.id-token-timeout-help: Enter this time in seconds, minutes, or hours (Max value is 86400 seconds (24 hours)).
client-form.refresh-token-timeout-help: Enter this time in seconds, minutes, or hours (Max value is 34128000 seconds (13 months)).

welcome.title: Welcome
welcome.body: OpenID Connect (OIDC) is an identity protocol built on top of the OAuth2 authorization framework. With OIDC SURFconext it is possible for Service Providers to join the SURFnet federation without having to implement the SAML2 protocol.

service-table.text: These are the services with active access/refresh tokens that can be used to access your SSO profile information. Access tokens are usually short-lived and provide services with access to specific resources. Refresh tokens are usually long-lived and provide services with the ability to get new access tokens without your involvement.
service-table.no-matches: There are no services that match your search criteria.
service-table.confirm-token: Are you sure sure you would like to revoke this token?
service-table.confirm-service: Are you sure sure you would like to revoke this service?
